vlive.korean: 당연하지 - 형 저 물어보고 싶은 거 있었어요 - 뭔데? Of course! - There was something that I wanted to ask you. - What is it? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
vlive.english: Of course! - There was something that I wanted to ask you. - What is it?

vlive.korean: 그럼요 당연하죠... Of course, it is.. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SEVENTEEN] 세븐틴 초토화, 두 글자면 충분합니다 🤷‍♂️부!!! 담!!!🤷‍♂️ (SEVENTEEN’s V after Manila concert)
와 근데 이거 다 들어간다 - 당연하죠! Wow, all this goes in. - Of course! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 연예찬 커플의 가방엔 뭐가 들어있을까? #왓츠인마이백[리얼:타임:러브2] VLOG
vlive.english: Wow, all this goes in. - Of course!

vlive.korean: [응... 당연하지] 겨드랑이 치는 거 보고 싶어요? [Yes... Of course] on V LIVE? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MONSTA X] 겨드랑이가 있는데 왜 치지를 못하니.. 채씨의 <겨드랑이 치기 좋은 날>🐢 (Hyungwon's how to remove swelling out)
[당연하지 80살이 뭐야] 제 인생 책임져주실 거예요? [Of course!] Will you be responsible for my life? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NU'EST] 어 그래 너.. 잘 살았다..! 이날 이때까지 울 망고했으니..! (REN playing with fans)
vlive.english: [Of course!] Will you be responsible for my life?
